mapper.select: SELECT id, phone_number AS "phoneNumber", password, name, sex, is_driver AS "isDriver", model, price, driving_age AS "drivingAge", location, head_potrait AS "headPotrait", user_level AS "userLevel", active AS "isActive" FROM user WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, phone_number AS "phoneNumber", password, name, sex, is_driver AS "isDriver", model, price, driving_age AS "drivingAge", location, head_potrait AS "headPotrait", user_level AS "userLevel", active AS "isActive" FROM user WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (phone_number, password, name, sex, is_driver, model, price, driving_age, location, head_potrait, user_level, active) VALUES (#{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{isDriver}, #{model}, #{price}, #{drivingAge}, #{location}, #{headPotrait}, #{userLevel}, #{isActive})
